message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you take 10%. We can negotiate further in the next rounds.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm willing to give you a generous 350,000. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential earnings!
I'm willing to compromise, but 350,000 is too low.  Let's split it 55/45.  If we keep going, inflation will hurt us both.
